charges.charge_description: 21:846...CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE AND TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentencing Hearing held: Court accepts Guilty plea to count 1s, which had been deferred and imposes sentence as follows: Eighty-four (84)months custody, 60 months supervised release, no fine, $100 special assessment. Court further recommends that the defendant participate in the drug treatment program while in custody of the BOP, if drug screening warrants; that the defendant participate in the voluntary CARE program. Standard conditions of supervised release imposed. Special conditions imposed: that the defendant participate in a substance abuse treatment program as directed by U.S. Probation and that the defendant participate in a vocational services program. SO ORDERED. Defendant advised of right to appeal on any remaining rights within 14 days of issuance of the judgment. Sentence reduction DENIED

charges.charge_disposition: The Court orders the defendant committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 45 months. Upon release, the defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 5 years with special conditions. The Court further imposes a special assessment in the amount of $100 and forfeiture in the amount of $3,779.00. Amended Sentencing - The Court orders the defendant committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 28 months. All other conditions remain the same.
